instructions: 以左手邊的 Abstract Group為參考點，準備出發。
看到左手邊的 RapidPipeline後左轉。
目的地就在前方的 Autodesk。

companies.name: Autodesk
companies.description: Autodesk is changing how the world is designed and made. Our technology spans media and entertainment, architecture, engineering, construction, product design, and manufacturing, empowering innovators everywhere to solve challenges big and small. From mesmerizing blockbusters to immersive game worlds and cutting-edge animation, our software provides artists and studios with the right tools to work, the ability to think flexibly, and the power to transform dreams into reality.
companies.categories: 3D Graphics, 3D Modeling, Animation/Film, Artifical Intelligence (AI), Motion Capture Software/Hardware, Rendering & Modeling, Simulation, Visual Effects Software
